title.rendered: “Breaking News: IDF Fighter Jets Decimate Hezbollah Strongholds in Lebanon – Explosive Details Inside”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

Fighter jets attacked in Lebanese territory; Hezbollah terror organization’s targets were destroyed

A short while ago, fighter jets attacked a military command of the Hezbollah terror organization in the area of Al Mansour and another command of the organization in the area of Binet Jebel.

Yesterday (Thursday), a military building of the Hezbollah terror organization in the area of Telusa was attacked, alongside another military building in the area of Majdal Zun.
At the end of the attack on the building, secondary explosions were identified, indicating the presence of warfare materials that were stored in the building.

Attached is documentation from the attacks: https://bit.ly/43aDZ6F
